selected_skills.name: extract_numerical_values_from_image
selected_skills.purpose: To extract numerical values from the table image for computing and wireless demand in 2014.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to extract the values 150 and 200 from the table image.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the total semiconductor demand by summing the extracted values.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to sum the extracted values 150 and 200.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as a floating-point number with one decimal place.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the calculated total demand as a floating-point number with one decimal place.
